other_tests.findings: Nonlocalizing results at initial surgery; revealed asymmetric uptake of the left submandibular gland on repeat imaging
other_tests.changes_over_time: Asymmetry in uptake was noted retrospectively in initial imaging; final PTH level decreased from 200 to 36 pg/mL after adenoma excision.

other_tests.findings: Uptake in the right superior thyroid lobe
other_tests.changes_over_time: PTH level decreased from 1019 to 562 pg/mL after subsequent right superior parathyroid and right thyroid lobe removal.
Final PTH level was 62 pg/mL after excision of the left inferior undescended parathyroid adenoma.
